messages.subject: having MAJOR computer probs ...
messages.msgSnippet: I ve gone to NO MAIL for the next two wks b/c dh is out of town AND it seems I ve got the nasty KAKWORM virus ... we have the MacAfee virus scanner, etc but it
messages.messageBody:
I've gone to NO MAIL for the next two wks b/c dh is out of town AND
it seems I've got the nasty KAKWORM virus ... we have the MacAfee
virus scanner, etc but it didn't pick this up ... I'm basically
computer illiterate, that is to say, I don't know how to get rid of
this??? ... *ACK*, I feel SO VIOLATED!!!

Mara, if you're reading ~> *YES* I'd love the info about "Growing
Without Schooling" magazine ... thanks so much :)

I'll return when I'm DEBUGGED :}
have a great day ...
Pris
